div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Seniors, If you are planning on majoring in Education, please download and fill out the application I sent to you in an email.email it to Mrs. Boggs tboggs@slaterschools.net Deadline is April...

Update for our end of school events: Prom - Fri., June 26 - 8:00 pm Pre-School Graduation - Thurs., July 9 - 6:00 pm JH Graduation-Thurs., July 9 - 7:30 pm HS Graduation-Fri., July 10 - 7:30 pm Stay safe, we can't wait to see you! view image

A Yearbook is the perfect gift for the awesome student(s) in your life, no matter their age!! Don't miss out on pre-ordering a 2020 VISION book before April is over. Want to sponsor a student's copy? Contact Lauren Crews at lcrews@slaterschools.net to order! view image
Ms. Maschmeier’s HS bio students, we are having another optional Zoom meeting at 2. Check the Google Classroom for information! If non-bio students want to join, email me!
5th graders---Sumdog contest starts today! Log in to your account and get started!!!
